thread.title: Cauliflower Is the New Cream: How to Make Rich, Savory Vegan Creamed Spinach
thread.title_full: Cauliflower Is the New Cream: How to Make Rich, Savory Vegan Creamed Spinach

author: J. Kenji López-Alt
title: Cauliflower Is the New Cream: How to Make Rich, Savory Vegan Creamed Spinach
text: This vegan creamed spinach uses cauliflower purée as a stand-in for the cream. The most amazing part: The dish tastes just as creamy, but is actually more intensely spinach-flavored as a result, since dairy can mute flavors. It's a win-win. Read More
